@RobGMacfarlane @TheMontyDon @EnvAgency Herefordshire farmers are not the best at looking after their land and heritage. We tried hard to safeguard the River Loden while we lived close to it, but you are up against the landowners, and local councils who look away rather than getting involved. Sad, isn't it?

@sciencebase @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm Exactly.  Pot Kettle Black.  And Forestry Commission has a piss-poor track record as custodian of public woodland.  Witness the Mortimer's Forest scandal in Herefordshire which would have seen vast areas sawn down for holiday homes. Thankfully seen off by huge opposition.

urls.title: Artist In Residence - Slow The Flow
urls.description: Slow The Flow have appointed Calderdale artist Anne Fox as ‘Artist In Residence’, as part of a projectto promote and interpret the environmental benefits of Natural Flood Management.

text: Our wonder Artist In Residence @AnneFoxArtist continues her work with us which is producing some lovely images.  More here if you haven’t already seen her work. https://t.co/2JrOo9A3Cj @EnvAgencyYNE @Calderdale @CalderdaleFound https://t.co/RVLzx6xPip
